oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.cluster.kmeans

Interface CriterionFunction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EuclideanDistanceCriterionFunction, SquaredErrorCriterionFunction

    public interface CriterionFunction
    Represents a criterion function used to determine if a cluster algorithm has finished during the cluster center update phase at reduce time. The life cycle of a an instace of this type is as follows: setup() //once per instance beforeClusterCenterUpdated() //once per cluster addClusterMember() //one or more times per cluster clusterCenterUpdated() //once per cluster getCriterionFunctionValue() // one or more times per cluster once clusterCenterUpdated() has been called isClusterConverging() // one or more times per cluster once clusterCenterUpdated() has been called
    Author:
    hsaucedo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addClusterMember(RecordInfo member, double[] memberPoint)
      Adds the data and point of an individual cluster member.
      void beforeClusterCenterUpdated(int clusterId, double[] clusterCenter, double critFunValue, long memberCount)
      Sets the current cluster and its state before the cluster point is updated.
      void clusterCenterUpdated(double[] clusterCenter)
      Sets the updated cluster center point
      double getCriterionFunctionValue()
      Gets the new criterion function value calculated using the updated cluster center point
      boolean isClusterConverging()
      Tell whether the criterion function is converging for the current cluster
      void setup(Configuration conf)
      Perform initialization tasks.

    • Method Detail

      • addClusterMember

        void addClusterMember(RecordInfo member,
                      double[] memberPoint)
        Adds the data and point of an individual cluster member. The implementer may need to copy the parameters values as the references could be reused.
        Parameters:
        member - a cluster member as a RecordInfo instance
        memberPoint - a cluster member point

      • beforeClusterCenterUpdated

        void beforeClusterCenterUpdated(int clusterId,
                                double[] clusterCenter,
                                double critFunValue,
                                long memberCount)
        Sets the current cluster and its state before the cluster point is updated.
        Parameters:
        clusterId - the cluster id
        clusterCenter - the cluster center point before updated
        critFunValue - the last criterion function value
        memberCount - the number of cluster members

      • clusterCenterUpdated

        void clusterCenterUpdated(double[] clusterCenter)
        Sets the updated cluster center point
        Parameters:
        clusterCenter - the cluster center point ordinates

      • getCriterionFunctionValue

        double getCriterionFunctionValue()
        Gets the new criterion function value calculated using the updated cluster center point
        Returns:
        the newest criterion function value

      • isClusterConverging

        boolean isClusterConverging()
        Tell whether the criterion function is converging for the current cluster
        Returns:
        true if the function is converging for the current cluster

      • setup

        void setup(Configuration conf)
        Perform initialization tasks. Called once per instance
        Parameters:
        conf - the job configuration
